suncertify.application
Class ConfigurationController

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.application.ConfigurationController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class ConfigurationController
extends Object
implements ActionListener

The controller in the Model-View-Controller architecture for the configuration of the application. Handles all GUI events from the Swing view (a modal dialog) and invokes a Configuration object to handle saving changes to the configuration.

Author:
Oliver Hernandez

Constructor Summary
ConfigurationController(Configuration model, JFrame frame)
          Create a controller for the specified model, and associate the modal dialog view to the specified owner window.
 
Method Summary
 void actionPerformed(ActionEvent event)
          Handle the "Save" action of the view by invoking the model to persist changes.
 void start()
          Display the view of the MVC implementation.
